author: rcm
msg: The reflection interface now allows clients to find out what extensions are available.  Also the idea of an unresolved title has been removed; it is no the responsibility of the BO to ensure that it deals with it resolved state properly.

author: rcm
msg: The object loader implementation can now update a cached object to reflect its changed OID.

author: rcm
msg: Added extension list and moved the debug details.

author: rcm
msg: Object loaders can now recreate transient objects and well as objects that are persistent.

author: rcm
msg: Specification now can details what extensions are available for a particular class of object.
